# Docker commands:
#

# Start the ELK stack:
#docker run -p 80:80 -p 9200:9200 -p 49021:49021 -p 49022:49022 -p 122:22 -p 9999:9999/udp 29fb3da4f590

#docker run -p 80:80 -p 9200:9200 -p 9300:9300 -p 9600:9600  -p 5044:5044 -p 49021:49021 -p 49022:49022 -p 122:22 -p 9999:9999/udp 29fb3da4f590

#docker run -p 80:80 -p 0.0.0.0:9200:9200 -p 9300:9300 -p 9600:9600  -p 5044:5044 -p 49021:49021 -p 49022:49022 -p 122:22 -p 9999:9999/udp 29fb3da4f590
